turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to make an order from Starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, I can help with that, which location are you picking up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's in Woodbridge Center in Woodbridge, NJ

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, and what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a Venti Iced Cafe Latte?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, would you like anything on it or no?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just some whipped cream on top, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, and sugar and milk is fine the way it is?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A few sugars and little bit of milk. It doesn't matter to me what kind.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, perfect. And you will be picking this up now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, it the next 20 minutes or so.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK. The price will be around $4-5 for the iced latted, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Awesome, then I will go ahead and place that order for you now. It should be ready shortly. You should be receiving a receipt confirming your order shortly after this call.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect, thank you!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. You would like to place another order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's it for today. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome. Is there anything else I can assist you with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's it for now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. Thank you and have a good day!
